verbs.description: PARIS ( AP ) — French President Emmanuel Macron [V: has] called his friend and ally U.S. President Donald Trump to say he 's very worried about tensions in the Middle East , after Trump 's decision to withdraw from the Iran nuclear accord . Macron 's office said the two leaders spoke Saturday and the French leader expressed his " great concern about stability " in the region . Macron strongly opposes Trump 's pullout from the 2015 global deal curbing Iran 's nuclear activities . Hostilities between Iran and Israel have already escalated in recent days . Macron and Trump also discussed trade issues . European governments are scrambling to save billions of dollars in trade with Iran that resumed thanks to the 2015 accord .

Macron strongly opposes Trump 's pullout from the 2015 global deal curbing Iran 's nuclear activities . Hostilities between Iran and Israel have already escalated in recent days . Macron and Trump also discussed trade issues . European governments are scrambling to save billions of dollars in trade with Iran that resumed thanks to the 2015 accord .
